ygData.subject: Peace Keeper Staffs
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I can tell the staff is not useable by a Mage. I think that the staff is useable by a paladin only but I have not confirmed this. I also had probles
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I can tell the staff is not useable by a Mage. I think that the
staff is useable by a paladin only but I have not confirmed this. I also had
probles with this quest and I thought that it was broken. The text from the
Woodworker says that he gives you the staff when you give him the not but I
did not recieve anything . I am not sure what his exact wording was but it
was somthing to the effect he is a staff.... take it and retrieve the needed
components. I may be wrong on this but that was my impression so I did not
work on it any further.

Let me know what you think.

Mushin
Enchnater.

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Pflanzer <pflanzer@...>
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 17, 1999 10:21 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] List activity? Let get it going.


>From: pflanzer@... (Scott Pflanzer)
>
>I read this list and have a quest question? :)
>
>I am working on the lost book quest -- this one is going ok right now
>
>but the quest that I am having a hard time with is the peacekeeper staff
>quest
>the question I have is can a Magi use the Peacekeeper Staff?
>if this staff is not usable by the Magi Classes then I will abandon the
>quest due to the fact that I have not found one of the items needed to
>complete the quest.
>
>Mushin wrote:
>
>> Would everyone who is in this mail list please post a message to let
>> me know if this list is active. So far I have not heard much from
>> people and I am not the list moderator but I will be trying to promote
>> this list and make it interesting for everyone.
>
